text: Teresa Hsiao (born May 26) is an American television writer and producer. ==Career== Hsiao received a degree in Economics from Harvard University in 2007. Hsiao has been a writer on Family Guy, We Bare Bears and a writer/producer on American Dad!. She has also written for The Huffington Post. Hsiao is the co-creator and an executive producer on the television comedy Awkwafina Is Nora from Queens. She had been developing the show with Awkwafina since 2016. The series premiered in January 2020. == References == == External links == * Category:American television producers Category:American women television producers Category:American television writers Category:Living people Category:American women television writers Category:American women of Taiwanese descent Category:Harvard University alumni Category:1985 births
title: Teresa Hsiao
